specs.tampo: Detailed taillights, white flames with red highlights, "Stingray", and Hot Wheels logo on sides, white stripes along top, "38" on sides and hood, Corvette logo on front and trunk, "CORVETTE" on rear, "427" on either side of hood scoop, 38th collectors convention wording on trunk, "FINALE" on rear black Hot Wheels license plate

notes: Finale Car 4,000 produced Base code(s): T22, T25
